statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM PlayerScores WHERE score < 50 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, location_id FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, score, achievements FROM PlayerScores WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, score, achievements FROM PlayerScores WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC, score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements FROM PlayerScores WHERE score < 50 AND location_id = 1 ORDER BY player_name ASC, achievements ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, location_id, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE achievements LIKE '%level%' ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, location, player_id FROM players;
SELECT player_name, location FROM players ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT player_name, location FROM players WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, points FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, location FROM players WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, points FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE points > 100;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, points FROM players LEFT JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE points IS NULL;
SELECT player_name AS 'Name', location AS 'Location' FROM players WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_location FROM players WHERE player_location='New York';
SELECT player_name, player_id, player_location FROM players WHERE player_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM scores;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_location FROM players WHERE player_location='New York';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_location FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(score) AS total_scores FROM scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_scores > 5;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, score, activity_date FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, location FROM PlayerLocations WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM LocationActivities WHERE activity_date = '2021-10-15' ORDER BY location;
SELECT player_id, score, activity_date FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC, player_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, achievement_id, achievement_name FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, location FROM LocationActivities WHERE location = 'Park' AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT player_id, location FROM PlayerLocations WHERE location LIKE 'Gym%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerScores ps JOIN PlayerLocations pl ON ps.player_id = pl.player_id WHERE pl.location = 'Beach' ORDER BY ps.score DESC, ps.player_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM player_scores;
SELECT player_id, activity_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, location_name, city, country FROM player_scores JOIN locations ON player_scores.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM player_scores;
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location_name FROM activities INNER JOIN locations ON activities.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achieved_date FROM player_achievements ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_score > 500;
